name: Ice Land
description:
This is a game centered around surviving in a harsh, cold environment, offering you the ultimate test of survival.

In the game, you will tackle the following primary tasks:
Mining and logging: Gather resources to sustain survival and craft various items using these materials to create a habitable environment.
Crop cultivation: Cultivate crops in adverse conditions to meet food requirements.
Animal husbandry: Acquire additional food and resources through animal breeding.
Recruiting NPCs: Employ assistants to help you complete various tasks and work.

You will need to carefully modify the environment, using a heating system to ensure a comfortable living environment for both yourself and the NPCs. However, you must also be mindful of the pollution generated by the heating system to maintain a delicate balance.

Additionally, the game provides main storyline missions to guide you to explore the game world more deeply, but these missions are not mandatory.

The game offers both single-player mode and local network multiplayer mode, enabling you to cooperate with friends to face the challenges of this cold world together and create even more excitement and enjoyment.
